text: (phir ladaee se jee kyon churaate ho) aur mohammad to sirph rasool hain (khuda nahin) inase pahale bahutere paigambar guzar chuke hain phir kya agar mohammad apanee maut se mar joe ya maar daale jaen to tum ulate pov (apane kufr kee taraf) palat jaoge aur jo ulate pov phirega (bhee) to (samajh lo) haragiz khuda ka kuchh bhee nahin bigadega aur anaqareeb khuda ka shukr karane vaalon ko achchha badala dega
